message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to your business. I'm initially offering it to you for $1,800,000. I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm interested in the product, but $1,800,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for it. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective on the price. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $1,400,000 is still too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $1,600,000?

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1,600,000, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
